messages.subject: a few books for sale
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All, I posted on the NMB some books for sale.  Might as well advertise them here. Tosogu No Kansho by Masayuki Sasano (1982).  A great reference book with
messages.messageBody:
Hi All,

I posted on the NMB some books for sale. Might as well advertise them here.

Tosogu No Kansho by Masayuki Sasano (1982). A great reference book with
English descriptions and nice photography of both iron and kinko tosogu. A
very good reference to have in your library.

http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/tnokansho.jpg
http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/tnokanshoopen.jpg PRICE $95


Tsuba Kodogu Kantei Nyumon By Iida & Wakayama (2000). An inexpensive Japanese
text covering both iron and kinko sword fittings with many detailed signature
pictures.
http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/tkkanteinyumon.jpg
http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/tkkanteinyumonopen.jpgPRICE
$45

Token Kakaku Jiten by Iido (1971). I am not sure why this book is not better
known but this japanese text packs a lot of reference material. It has both
sword oshigato and detailed fittings signatures. A valuable reference not
often found.
http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/tkakakufronspine.jpg
http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/tkakakuopen.jpgPRICE $75

Japanese National History Museum collection catalog of Izumi county
(Translation is a bit off). something to the effect of noted sword & armor
exhibition. A nice detailed catalog covering all aspects of Samurai wear. Has
detailed swords pictures with good mei pictures along with nice photographs of
sword fittings, kabutos and many other items. A good value
http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/izumi_nat_histmuseumcatalog.jpg

http://i25.photobucket.com/albums/c52/kamakiri/books/izumi_nat_histmuseumopen.jpg
PRICE $30

Will combine shipping. Shipping is actual cost. paypal please add 3%. Thanks.
Ken





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
